医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
远程医疗的使用可能会对农村社区获得当地护理产生意想不到的影响远程医疗服务通常称为远程医疗或远程医疗，对于那些难以亲自拜访其首选医疗服务提供者的患者来说通常是有益的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Telemedicine-usage-can-have-unexpected-impact-on-rural-communities-access-to-local-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Telemedicine-usage-can-have-unexpected-impact-on-rural-communities-access-to-local-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f534733c-0ac0-4092-a9f9-11675b8f9a8a Thu, 01 Aug 2024 22:23:02 -0400 Telemedicine usage can have unexpected impact on rural communities' access to local care
年龄和文化压力影响全球女性对身体的欣赏《PLOS ONE》的一项研究表明，对身体的欣赏很大程度上受到种族和社会文化压力的影响，尼日利亚黑人女性的满意度最高，而西方白人女性的满意度最低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Age-and-culture-Pressures-shape-body-appreciation-among-women-worldwide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Age-and-culture-Pressures-shape-body-appreciation-among-women-worldwide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2605dc18-9a05-4510-a4d5-0c58acfcc9fe Thu, 01 Aug 2024 21:32:00 -0400 Age and cultural pressures shape body appreciation among women worldwide
与禽流感有关的绿头苍蝇在日本南部蔓延九州大学的研究人员发现，在日本南部，绿头苍蝇（一种对腐肉和粪便有强烈吸引力的苍蝇家族）携带禽流感病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Blowflies-linked-to-bird-flu-spread-in-southern-Japan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Blowflies-linked-to-bird-flu-spread-in-southern-Japan.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b82549c2-c1da-4b6d-80e6-efedce7ea26b Thu, 01 Aug 2024 21:23:17 -0400 Blowflies linked to bird flu spread in southern Japan
不受控制的高血压：对全球健康的持续威胁在美国和世界范围内，心血管疾病是过早死亡和残疾的主要可避免原因。心血管疾病主要是心脏病和中风，全国每年有超过 90 万人死亡，全球约有 1000 万人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Uncontrol-hypertension-A-persistent-threat-to-global-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Uncontrol-hypertension-A-persistent-threat-to-global-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffffb6fbb-4bc0-4451-81ad-61d09d44c1a4 Thu, 01 Aug 2024 21:17:01 -0400 Uncontrolled hypertension: A persistent threat to global health
KFF 健康新闻“健康怎么样？”：堕胎让总统竞选升温可能的民主党总统候选人名单的变化正在促使堕胎权和反堕胎组织重新调整他们的竞选活动，尽管他们正在为最终确定许多州的秋季投票提案而奋斗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Abortion-heats-up-presidential-race.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Abortion-heats-up-presidential-race.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9a57cc4-e726-4ab2-86ca-e093572c46c0 Thu, 01 Aug 2024 20:56:08 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': Abortion heats up presidential race
研究揭示肥胖对射血分数保留的心力衰竭患者肌肉结构的影响约翰霍普金斯大学医学研究人员领导的一项新的小型研究于 7 月 25 日发表在《自然心血管研究》杂志上，该研究揭示了肥胖对患有射血分数保留心力衰竭 (HFpEF) 的心力衰竭患者的肌肉结构的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Study-reveals-obesitys-impact-on-muscle-struct-in-heart-failure-with-preserved-ejection-fraction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Study-reveals-obesitys-impact-on-muscle-struct-in-heart-failure-with-preserved-ejection-fraction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00591d5e-6ad7-447f-9a1c-9c8e5044c0e6 Thu, 01 Aug 2024 15:32:55 -0400 Study reveals obesity's impact on muscle structure in heart failure with preserved ejection fraction
范德比尔特引入聚焦超声治疗原发性震颤和帕金森病范德比尔特大学医学中心的运动障碍神经病学和神经外科团队准备将聚焦超声治疗（FUS）作为治疗特发性震颤和帕金森病的新工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Vanderbilt-to-introduce-focused-ultrasound-for-treating-essential-tremor-and-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Vanderbilt-to-introduce-focused-ultrasound-for-treating-essential-tremor-and-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f55211dd-6a4c-45c9-9b40-0dfda065ff4b Thu, 01 Aug 2024 15:30:00 -0400 Vanderbilt to introduce focused ultrasound for treating essential tremor and Parkinson's disease
新的实验室技术捕捉了阿尔茨海默病发展中的衰老影响圣路易斯华盛顿大学医学院的研究人员开发了一种方法来捕捉衰老对阿尔茨海默病发展的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/New-lab-technique-captures-aging-effects-in-Alzheimers-disease-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/New-lab-technique-captures-aging-effects-in-Alzheimers-disease-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa45c161-6d6e-49af-bc11-d08d5ec3ae5b Thu, 01 Aug 2024 15:26:40 -0400 New lab technique captures aging effects in Alzheimer's disease development
研究表明气候异常导致霍乱菌株的出现新的研究表明，厄尔尼诺事件可能在 20 世纪初的一场大流行期间帮助了一种新型霍乱菌株的建立和传播，支持了气候异常可能为新霍乱菌株的出现创造机会的观点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Study-suggests-climate-anomalies-contribute-to-cholera-strain-emergence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Study-suggests-climate-anomalies-contribute-to-cholera-strain-emergence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=905b26d8-31fe-404b-8dd5-dc55dcbad731 Thu, 01 Aug 2024 15:22:04 -0400 Study suggests climate anomalies contribute to cholera strain emergence
新研究揭示了人类和酵母中常见的 DNA 复制机制《科学》和《美国国家科学院院刊》杂志上发表的两项研究报告称，人类和面包酵母的共同点比表面上看到的要多，其中包括有助于确保 DNA 正确复制的重要机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/New-studies-reveal-common-DNA-replication-mechanisms-in- humans-and-yeast.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/New-studies-reveal-common-DNA-replication-mechanisms-in- humans-and-yeast.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7708d85d-dc2b-4e3f-9b62-40b36dcaa974 Thu, 01 Aug 2024 15:18:18 -0400 New studies reveal common DNA replication mechanisms in humans and yeast
